ingredients.content: 100 g fresh shiitake mushrooms, sliced (2 mm)
100 g fresh button mushrooms, sliced (2 mm)
100 g fresh shimeji mushrooms, ends trimmed
100 g fresh enokitake mushrooms, ends trimmed
100 g fresh white shimeji mushrooms, ends trimmed

preparations.content: Place oil and 2 spring onions in mixing bowl then sauté <b>3 min/120°C/speed 1<b>.
Add all the mushrooms and sauté <b>5 min/100°C//speed <b>.
Add salt and, with aid of spatula, cook <b>30 sec/100°C/speed 1<b>. Garnish with remaining spring onion and serve hot.
